column2: Hello there!\nIt[']s so very nice to meet you!\pWelcome to the world of Pokemon!\p
My name is Rowan.\pHowever, everyone just calls me\nthe Pokemon Professor.\pBefore I go any further, is this\nyour first adventure?\p
If you need advice, I[']m certainly\ncapable of giving it.\p
This world is widely inhabited by\ncreatures known as Pokemon.\p
All right, so you[']re a boy?
All right, so you[']re a girl?
Tell me, what is your name?\p
OK[...]\nSo, you[']re \vÀ?\pA fine name that is!\pNow, this boy here[...]\nI believe he[']s your friend.\p

All right, \vÀ, the time
has come.\pYour very own tale of grand
adventure is about to unfold.\pOn your journey, you will meet
countless Pokemon and people.\pI[']m sure that along the way you will
discover many things, perhaps even\lsomething about yourself.\pNow, go on, leap into the world of
Pokemon!\p
